h2_title: How-to Guides for Secrets and Chapters
content: This well-reviewed 8Bitdo Ultimate 2C Wireless Controller for PC and Android is compatible with Windows 10 and above and Android 9.0 and above. It has 1000Hz polling rate, remappable L4/R4 bumpers and more special features.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How-to_Guides.md', within the main section titled 'How-to Guides', specifically from the subsection 'How-to Guides for Secrets and Chapters' and the sub-subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Wireless Controller'.
The content is as follows:
This well-reviewed 8Bitdo Ultimate 2C Wireless Controller for PC and Android is compatible with Windows 10 and above and Android 9.0 and above. It has 1000Hz polling rate, remappable L4/R4 bumpers and more special features.
